channel.title: Comments on: Man Buried In Sand

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: I spoke with it and it misses you to. Says to bring a shovel and pail the next time you come to visit.
item.content:encoded: I spoke with it and it misses you to. Says to bring a shovel and pail the next time you come to visit.

item.title: By: Paulo
item.dc:creator: Paulo
item.description: That's "The Awakening," which until recently was installed at <a href="http://hownow.brownpau.com/archives/2005/05/hanging_out_at_hains_point/" rel="nofollow">Hains Point in SW DC</a>, but was moved to National Harbor to attract visitors. I miss it. :(
item.content:encoded: That’s “The Awakening,” which until recently was installed at Hains Point in SW DC, but was moved to National Harbor to attract visitors. I miss it.
